import './JobForm.styles.css' import { useState } from 'react' const defaultFormFieds = { companyName:"", jobTitle: "", fullTime: '', city: "", state: '', contact: "", description: "", compensation: "", datePosted: "", address: "", companyWebsite: "", } const JobForm = () => { const [form, setForm] = useState(defaultFormFieds) const { companyName, jobTitle, fullTime, city, state, contact, description, compensation, datePosted, address, companyWebsite } = form const handleSubmit = (event) => { event.preventDefault() // post axios call console.log(form) } const handleChange = (event) => { const { name, value } = event.target setForm({...form, [name]: value}) } return ( <>

) } export default JobForm
